mapper.select: /* 채널정보 조회 (내선번호) selectItemByPhoneNum */ select cii.phone_num ,cii.phone_ip ,cii.channel ,cii.system_code ,ts.system_ip ,nvl(ts.backup_ip, '') as backup_ip from crec_ip_info cii inner join tbl_system ts on cii.system_code = ts.system_code where cii.phone_num = #{phone_num} and rownum = 1
